episodes.title: For Your Island - AOTD 83
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Art of the Drink talks with Erica Robinson and Joseph Plescia of Hofstra University's "For Your Island" and explores what it means to be a bartender in the era of craft cocktails.

episodes.title: Earth Day Cocktail - AOTD 82
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: For Earth Day, Art of the Drink teams up with Glass Dharma to bring you a cocktail that's as eco-friendly as it is delicious!

episodes.title: Talking Pisco with Junior Merino - AOTD 81
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Here's one from the vaults that was never released! Junior Merino and I visit the Pisco Porton distillery in Ica, Peru, for the brand launch, and I have the chance to get his take on all things Pisco!

episodes.title: Science of Mixology: Vodka Flash - AOTD 80
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony gives his engineering degree a workout in this special Science of the Drink episode when he combines lasers and spirits to create the seemingly impossible Vodka Served as a Flash of Light featured on the hit TV series Parks and Recreation!

episodes.title: Science of Mixology: Physics of Flair - AOTD 79
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Join Anthony in the Drambuie LaBARatory at the Manhattan Cocktail Classic and discover how flair bartenders flip bottles without spilling!

episodes.title: Science of Mixology: Shaking vs Stirring - AOTD 78
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Join Anthony in the Drambuie LaBARatory at the Manhattan Cocktail Classic and find out when to shake and when to stir your favorite cocktail!

episodes.title: Science of Mixology: Chilled Glassware - AOTD 77
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Join Anthony in the Drambuie LaBARatory at the Manhattan Cocktail Classic and learn whether you should pre-chill your martini glasses!

episodes.title: Science of Mixology: Craft Ice - AOTD 76
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Join Anthony in the Drambuie LaBARatory at the Manhattan Cocktail Classic to discover whether craft ice is better than regular cubed ice!

episodes.title: Drambuie 15 Release!
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony talks with Tom Fischer of BourbonBlog.com about the newly-launched Drambuie 15 at Tales of the Cocktail!

episodes.title: Pisco Porton Sour - Art of the Drink 75
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony visits Nuela in New York City to mix the definitive Pisco Sour with Master Distiller Johnny Schuler of Pisco Portón!

episodes.title: Truvia Natural Sweetener Demo
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony heads down to the House Beautiful 2010 Kitchen of the Year and mixes up some fresh smoothies using Truvia™ natural sweetener.

episodes.title: Maker's 46 - Art of the Drink 74
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony returns to the Maker's Mark distillery for the launch of Maker's 46 and finds out everything you ever wanted to know about their first new product in company history!

episodes.title: Classic Mint Julep - Art of the Drink 73
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Following the 136th running of the Kentucky Derby, Anthony visits one of America's top restaurants to make the quintessential Derby drink: a Maker's Mark Mint Julep!

episodes.title: Samuels Redux - AOTD on the Road
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony waxes philosophic about Bourbon at the NYC Beer, Bourbon & BBQ Festival with Tom Fischer of BourbonBlog.com.

episodes.title: Samuels Redux - AOTD on the Road
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony makes his Samuels cocktail for Tom Fischer of BourbonBlog.com at the Beer, Bourbon and BBQ Festival in New York City.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 73: Steve Collins
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony mixes up his stevia-based version of the classic Tom Collins for the folks at Bombay Sapphire.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 72: White House Press Dinner, Pt. 3
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony wraps up his visit to the Capital File Magazine White House Press Correspondents' Dinner After Party in the last episode of this 3-part AOTD-On-The-Road series!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 71: White House Press Dinner, Pt. 2
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony tastes more incredible drinks at the Capital File Magazine White House Press Correspondents' Dinner After Party in the second of this 3-part AOTD On The Road series!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 70: White House Press Dinner, Pt.1
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony heads down to Washington, DC, to attend the Capital File Magazine White House Press Correspondents' Dinner After Party in the first of this 3-part AOTD On The Road series!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 69: Root Beer Float
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony wraps up his visit to Daddy-O with a Maker's Mark Root Beer Float!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 68: Passion Fruit Paloma
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony returns to Daddy-O with Charlotte and makes her unique Passion Fruit Paloma just in time for Spring!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 67: Shark Ice
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony travels to Positano, Italy, and discovers a new orange-flavored martini!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 66: Maverick
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony follows up his Baracktail with a new drink for the McCain fans!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 65: Baracktail
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Here's a quick drink for you to enjoy while watching the election coverage - next up, a cocktail for McCain!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 64: Daddy-O
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Charlotte return to Daddy-O and make their signature Bourbon martini.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 63: Rosie Lee
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Award-winning bartender Charlotte Voisey joins Anthony at Daddy-O and makes her original rose-infused gin cocktail.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 62: Maker's Mark Old Fashioned
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony visits Devin Tavern to enjoy their Bourbon-glazed prawns and fresh-fruit Old Fashioned!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 61: Fresh Sour
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony shows Leah how to make fresh Sour Mix for all kinds of cocktails!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 60: Margarita
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Leah returns to learn the classic recipe for a top-shelf Margarita!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 59: July 4th Pina Colada
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Leah celebrate Independence Day with a red, white, and blue pina colada!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 58: Absinthe
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Always wanted to try absinthe? Anthony and Leah show you the traditional way to prepare the world's most mysterious spirit.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 57: Memorial Day Sex On The Beach
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: For Memorial Day, Anthony shows Stephanie two versions of Sex on the Beach.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 56: Classic Cocktails - Manhattan
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony heads down to Loretto, KY, and brings back a classic Maker's Mark Manhattan!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 55: Lychee Martini
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony shows you how to add some Asian flavor to your next martini!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 54: Easter Spring Awakening
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Stephanie returns to welcome back Spring with an AOTD original cocktail.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 53: St. Patrick's Day Nutty Irishman
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Stephanie show you how to make a Nutty Irishman for your St. Patrick's Day celebration!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 52: New Year's Eve Cocktail
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Caitlin combine Maker's Mark and hard cider to create an original AOTD New Year's Eve Cocktail!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 51: Maker's Mark Egg Nog
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and the DrinkArt Girls bring Maker's Mark Egg Nog to the Dailymotion Holiday Party!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 50: Singapore Sling
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Art of the Drink celebrates its 50th episode with a Singapore Sling!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 49: Thanksgiving Vanilla Martini
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Just in time for Thanksgiving, Anthony and Carlyn show you the perfect dessert drink for your Turkey Day feast!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 48: Classic Cocktail - Sidecar
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Carlyn continue the AOTD Classic Cocktails Series and show you how to make a cognac martini!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 47: Labor Day Master Steak
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: For Labor Day, Anthony shows you how to go from bar to barbecue with a Maker's Mark Master Steak!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 46: Yakety Yak
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Art of the Drink returns for its second year with a grown-up version of the classic New York egg cream!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 45: The Samuels
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Melissa wrap up AOTD's first year with an original cocktail honoring the First Family of Bourbon.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 44: Caipirinha
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: As the weather warms up, Anthony & Melissa show you the secrets behind Brazil's national drink, the Caipirinha.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 43: Easter Ascension
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony brings back Melissa for an original Easter cocktail!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 42: Espresso Martini
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony visits Bean Traders again in search of an espresso and transforms it into a martini.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 41: Bourbon Tasting Class
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Join Anthony in a Bourbon Tasting Class hosted by Master Distiller David Pickerell!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 40: St. Patrick's Day Irish Coffee
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony delves into the art and science of making the perfect Irish Coffee!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 39: Season 2 Outtakes
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: A compilation of the funniest moments from our second season (so far)!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 38: Maker's Mark Distillery Tour
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony takes you on a guided tour and shows you how Bourbon is made by the masters!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 37: Negroni
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: The Negroni, another addition to the Classic Cocktails Series, stuns in both looks and taste.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 36: Sazerac
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Krysta prepare for Mardi Gras with a traditional Sazerac.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 35: His-n-Hers
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony introduces February DrinkArt Girl Krysta and shows you the perfect new libation for Valentine's Day!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 34: Bill Samuels Jr. Interview
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony visits Loretto, KY, and talks with Maker's Mark president Bill Samuels Jr.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 33: Champagne Cocktail
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony shows you the correct way to open a bottle of bubbly for your New Year's Eve celebration!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 32: Anthony's Syllabub
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: "Art of the Drink" wishes you a Merry Christmas with Anthony's Syllabub!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 31: Ginger Green Tea Toddy
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: As cold weather settles in, Anthony and Tracy warm things up with a Ginger Green Tea Hot Toddy!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 30: Candy Cane Martini
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony's back behind the bar in December with a new DrinkArt Girl and a Candy Cane Martini to usher in the holiday month!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 29 Rose Petal
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony shows you a versatile virgin drink for holiday family outings or entertaining at home!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 28 Hot Buttered Cider
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: This Thanksgiving, Anthony breaks out his special Bourbon-based Hot Buttered Cider!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 27 Rick Lyke Interview
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: In this episode of our AOTD On The Road in November series, Anthony interviews beverage writer Rick Lyke.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 26 Mai Tai
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Live from the 2006 World Beer Festival, Anthony shows you how to make a Mai Tai!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 25 Zombie
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Who says fire kills the undead? Cap off your Halloween costume with Anthony's Flaming Zombie!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 24 Season 1 Highlights
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: While we're on break, enjoy some highlights from the "Art of the Drink" Video Podcast's first season!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 23 Presbyterian
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Whitney wrap up September with the second installment of the AOTD Classic Cocktails Series: a Presbyterian.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 22 Applejack Rabbit
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: The essence of apples and maple syrup herald the coming of Autumn in this unique cocktail.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 21 First Down
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Whitney toast the opening of football season with a First Down!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 20 Hurricane
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Whitney mark the onset of storm season and pay tribute to New Orleans with a Hurricane that even FEMA can get right.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 19 Whisky Flip
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Kat kick off the AOTD Classic Cocktails series with a Whisky Flip!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 18 Metropolitan
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Kat show you how to enjoy the Emmy Awards in style with a classic Metropolitan.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 17 Snake Bite
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony and Kat get ready for the premiere of Snakes on a Plane with two versions of a Snake Bite.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 16 Blue Motorcycle
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: As riders at the Sturgis Motorcycle Rally show off their bikes, Anthony and Rachel show you how to trick out a Long Island Iced Tea into a Blue Motorcycle.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 15 Cosmopolitan
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: As we enter National Admit You're Happy Month, Anthony and Melissa prepare a Cosmopolitan to help you better enjoy the coming weeks of bliss!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 14 Lynchburg Lemonade
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Put some punch in your next picnic! Anthony shows you how to make a Jack Daniel's-based Lynchburg Lemonade.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 13 Wine Presentation
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: As the Tour de France draws to a close, Anthony and Melissa open a bottle of vin rouge and take the mystery out of tableside wine presentation.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 12 Planter's Punch
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Anthony raises a bottle of rum to the opening of "Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest" and concocts a Planter's Punch with Miss All-American North Carolina, Melissa!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 11 Bourbon and Branch
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: For the Fourth of July, Anthony introduces you to America's national drink the Bourbon & Branch, and July's Drinkart Girl Melissa!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 10 Kryptini
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Toast the opening of "Superman Returns" with our out-of-this-world Kryptini! Anthony and Rachel reveal the creation of this super cranapple martini with a touch of vanilla.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 09 Sunset Pousse-Cafe
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Midsummer is here and Anthony pays tribute with his spectacular flaming Sunset Pousse-Café! He and Rachel take you through layering and lighting a cordial.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 08 Godfather
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: This Father's Day, treat Dad to a classic martini built on the rocks. Anthony and Rachel show you how to make a bourbon-based Godfather.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 07 World Cup
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Enjoy the World Cup games while drinking a World Cup cocktail - Anthony's tribute to the international soccer tournament! Anthony and Rachel will show you how to make this uniquely American rendition of the famous English Pimm's Cup.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 06 White Chocolate Martini
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: In honor of National Dairy Month, Anthony is going to introduce you to his delectable White Chocolate Martini as well as our new Drinkart Girl for June - the equally delicious Rachel!

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 05 Beach Bellini
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Heading to the beach for Memorial Day? Anthony and Ashley will help you bring a taste of the Italian Riviera to your holiday with this jazzed-up version of the Peach Bellini.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 04 Holy Grail
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Celebrate the premiere of "The Da Vinci Code" by embarking on a quest for the perfect Holy Grail! Anthony and Ashley will show you the secrets behind making this original twist on the classic Bloody Mary.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 03 Mimosa Royale
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Mother's Day is almost here. Along with the flowers, why don't you surprise Mom with her new favorite drink? Anthony and Ashley show you how to kick up a Mimosa.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 02 Ginger Julep
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Bet on an underdog this year in the Kentucky Derby. Anthony and Ashley have a twist for you on the always-the-favorite mint, a GINGER Julep.

episodes.title: Art of the Drink 01 Mexican Mojito
episodes.author: Art of the Drink
episodes.summary: Our pilot episode, welcome! It's almost Cinco de Mayo. Are you ready to serve your guests drinks? Or what will you order when you get to the bar?
